<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update inventory catalog item"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/items/{InventoryItemId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing inventory catalog item with new values.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Updatable Fields**:
- `Name` - Display name
- `ItemNumber` - Part number or SKU
- `CategoryId` - Category classification
- `Description` - Long-form description
- `AverageCost` - Average unit cost
- `MinQuantityAvailable` - Reorder threshold
- `MaxQuantityAvailable` - Overstock threshold
- `TrackSupplier` / `TrackUnits` - Tracking options
- `CustomFieldValues` - Custom field data (when UpdateCustomFields is true)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"InventoryItemId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the inventory catalog item to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated inventory item data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory catalog item.","properties":{"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier (required for updates, generated on create)."},"InventoryTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the inventory type."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site scope that owns the item."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product scope identifier."},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Category identifier."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the item."},"ItemNumber":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal part number or SKU."},"ImageId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the item's image file."},"TrackSupplier":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to track supplier for this item."},"TrackUnits":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to track units for this item."},"QuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","description":"Total quantity available."},"AverageCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Average unit cost."},"UseFixedCost":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to use fixed cost pricing."},"FixedCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true,"description":"Fixed unit cost when UseFixedCost is true."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description."},"MinQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","description":"Minimum quantity threshold."},"MaxQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Maximum quantity threshold."},"UpdateCustomFields":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, custom field values will be updated."},"CustomFieldValues":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Custom field values to set.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Custom field value for an inventory item.","properties":{"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the inventory item."},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the custom field type."},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The field value as a string."},"MappedProperties":{"type":"object","nullable":true,"additionalProperties":true,"description":"Additional mapped properties for the field value."}},"title":"InventoryItemCustomFieldValue"}}},"title":"UpdateInventoryItemRequest"},"example":{"Name":"Chromebook Motherboard Rev B","Description":"Replacement motherboard for Chromebook models 2020-2022","AverageCost":42.5,"MinQuantityAvailable":25}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
